alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 03 at 6:44PM CST until March 03 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE FAR NORTHWESTERN TEXAS PANHANDLE... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE FAR NORTHWESTERN TEXAS PANHANDLE... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron and Texas. In Texas... Dallam. * 20 Foot Winds...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...2 to 4. * Timing...12 PM through 7 PM CST Friday.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
